original_title: Calamity Jane & Delphine Seyrig, A Story
overview: Delphine Seyrig decided to work on a film project about Calamity Jane to reveal Jane’s sensibility and insight about life in those letters to her daughter. The reading of those letters permits a self-reflection about feminism and motherhood.
title: Calamity Jane & Delphine Seyrig, A Story
